messages.agent_message: Would you like to create a new account?
Ok! No accounts will be created.
Would you like to send any funds to a contact today?
No problem! No e-transfers will be sent.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my mortgage bill.

messages.agent_message: Please specify the account you want to select.
messages.user_message: I want to use chequing for this.

messages.agent_message: Ok, I'm paying your mortgage bill from your chequing account.
Would you like to request money from a contact?
How much money would you like to request and from who?
messages.user_message: Please request my contact Sandra to send the 37 they owe.

messages.agent_message: Ok, I asked Sandra to send you 37. I'll notify you when the payment is received.
Would you like to transfer any money between your existing accounts?
Ok! Please specify the funds you which to transfer and the accounts to transfer between.
messages.user_message: I want to send 5000 to retirement fund from savings.

messages.agent_message: Ok! I successfully transferred your requested amount of 5000 from savings to retirement fund.
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
